situation.headline: Company Name is [facing specific challenge].

situation.context: You've tasked your CMO and Head of Sales to diagnose the problem and build an action plan.

criticalGap.title: Critical Gap Detected
criticalGap.description: Your [specific metric] score X/10 on the [Framework]™. For [deal context], benchmark is Y+. This gap is likely costing X-Y% of winnable deals.

aiCoachInsight: I've analyzed [Company]'s public footprint. Your [Dimension] score of X/10 is your biggest blocker. I see [specific observations]. A few quick questions will sharpen this picture.

q1.question: When you lose deals, is it price confusion, proof points, or something else?
q1.answer: Specific answer based on company analysis...

q2.question: How many case studies would you confidently share with a CFO?

patternDetected.title: Pattern Detected

criticalFinding.description: Your [metric] score X/10 on the [Framework]™. For [deal context], benchmark is Y+. Estimated impact: This gap is likely costing X-Y% of winnable deals.

expertInsight: Your '[specific claim]' claim could be worth $X annually to customers. That's a story that closes deals — if you quantify it.
